name: Custom Survey Landing Page
description: A module for creating a nicer landing page for doing mailers and code entry for surveys

project-settings.name:
INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE
Adjust your settings here and then view the get 'Survey Access Code' page under Survey Distribution Tools for the urls to use

Description (optional)
Appears in middle of box (you can use HTML if you like)

Placeholder (optional)
hint to appear in input, e.g. ABC123

Background Image (optional)
Designed for FULL SCREEN - so use something big (jpg/png preferred) - will be white otherwise

Align Background Image to Top (optional)
Keep the image aligned vertically to the top when zoomed or on small screens

Use API Url
If your server uses shibboleth or does not permit outside access to the base url, check this box to force an api-based landing page. If you have previously made a short-url, you need to also clear the short url by checking the box below

Reset Short Url
If you chance the 'use-api-url' option above, you may need to update your short-url which is normally cached once created and will not normally be updated when you toggle the Use API Url option above.
